title: Does the Tax Reform Bill 2017 provide for reductions in small businesses?
subtitle: In contrast to rumours, the tax law does not eliminate discounts on small business expenditures, although it would examine reductions in business expenses for employees that have not been paid.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Under the Tax Reform Act 2017, which is currently being worked through Congress, all reductions in business-related expenses incurred by small business owners and self-employed persons will be eliminated.
